scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.start: cd .. && npm run build && cd playground && npm run copy && npx parcel serve src/index.html -d docs --no-source-maps
scripts.build-dev-no-maps: npm run copy &&export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-content-hash  --no-source-maps
scripts.build-dev: export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run build-only && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/magica/playground && mkdir -p ../../demos/docs/magica/playground &&  mv docs/* ../../demos/docs/magica/playground/
scripts.build-only: npm run copy && export NODE_ENV=production && node --max-old-space-size=5000 node_modules/parcel/bin/cli.js build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report  --no-source-maps --public-url './'
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
